title: Return of normalcy key to consumption pick up: T V Somanathan, finance secretary - Mint
content: Return of normalcy key to consumption pick up: T V Somanathan, finance secretary  Mint
description: In an interview to Mint, finance secretary and secretary, expenditure, T V Somanathan explains the synergy between the Centre and the states on capital spending and assesses what is hindering a pick-up in consumption
